website_summaries.verdict: Great basic clipper with a good grip and an affordable price tag.
pros: A fraction of the cost of some other models, this clipper from a trusted brand stands out for being good quality and providing fast results
Gentle, easy to use, and good for young babies
cons: Consistency of product could be improved
some users feel it's too fragile

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and potentially harmful
customer_reviews.text: After just a half dozen uses these broke in a pretty dangerous way. They cracked and bent causing the sharp ends to become misaligned. This was totally unexpected after a half dozen uses, so I didn't inspect it before use. This bent my child's nail up rather than cutting it causing him a lot of unnecessary pain. If you do purchase these, make sure the blades(?) line up before each use.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me as i have hemiparesis from brain tumors
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me as i have hemiparesis from brain tumors. i tried and TRIED to get regular clippers to work with my near useless left side...impossible! these little clippers are a Godsend!!! i can hold them and operate them fairly easily!!! you don't really appreciate the little things till you're robbed of them!! would recommend these for anyone with issues like mine,...would be perfect for stroke survivors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Clipping a child's nails is like trying to wrestle a pig in mud at times
customer_reviews.text: Clipping a child's nails is like trying to wrestle a pig in mud at times. If you can relate, these are for you. The larger body and handle of these trimmers give you complete control as you try to pin down your little bundle of joy and try to not clip off their entire finger. Just make sure you don't push down super hard all the time with the clipping action. We did have one of these break where it connects to the end, but that was after 2-3 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best.  Clippers.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these clippers in a baby grooming kit and proceeded to lose them after 3 uses. I bought a different brand because it was cheap and they were absolutely awful; that's when I decided to order these again. The grip is perfect for an adult hand to hold, the clippers are sharp enough to cut my son's nails and it doesn't catch during the clipping process so I get a clean cut every time.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine Honeybutter

customer_reviews.title: Not like my earlier purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like the brand. My first set was great but getting wore out so I replaced it with this one. This was very dissapointing. The blades are not properly aligned. The old ones would snap through the nails. These one just kind of cut and leave some of the nail still attached. So you cannot hear the sound to say it is through and then the nail is still attached.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: No. Not like they use to be.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these in the past. That’s why I paid the 3x price they are compared to regular baby clippers. My first pair were just 100% defective and wouldn’t cut anything. Just bent a baby nail. I would barely clip mine will full force. I sent them back and reordered another pair. They are just ok. I can’t use them on the baby. It’s just unsteady and not safe. I used them on my 5 yr old and I’ll keep them because I’m embarrassed to return again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Buy better quality
customer_reviews.text: These clippers fell apart on us on the third use. Pin came out. Using needle nose pliers it was very hard to get back in and prone to come out again. This one is a bust. Recommend passing on it.
customer_reviews.author: cech

customer_reviews.title: Not for little babies
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product. I have another set of Safety First nail clippers I got from a Minnie Mouse bundle that work great but this one feels different in the hand and I think it's maybe larger? I've never hurt my daughter (she's one now so was probably 4-6 months when I tried these) with the other clippers but with these ones it cuts too low, the two times I used them I nicked her fingers so I stopped and just use the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Briannam916

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Love these clippers. The grip is really firm so there's no worry about them slipping when you're trying to clip the baby's nails. I like that these clippers are lightweight but sturdy enough to wrap your hand around. The clippers themselves are sharp enough and very easy to press down on, without cutting the baby's skin. I also love the safety feature and the simple way the clipper slots back into its holder. It's also easy to find in the bathroom cabinet because of both its size and color.
customer_reviews.author: KellyH

customer_reviews.title: Love these clippers for my little humans!
customer_reviews.text: We received our first pair of these at a shower for our first child 6+ years ago. Now at 3 children total (lots of clipping in this house!) we've JUST had to replace these clippers. I was so excited to see this exact "model" was still being sold. It's got a great fit in your hand that allows you to make steady cuts even with squirmy toddlers. And I know there are models out there with lights and magnifying parts...that just seems excessive and distracting to me though. I can't say I've tried them, but there's no need because the simplicity of this design combined with effective blades on these clippers work wonders!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Infant/Toddler Nail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this to replace a pair we had when my child was born. It took over two years for the original pair to break and even then it's because my toddler was playing with them and somehow broke it. I loves these clippers more than any other pair we've tried. The hand-held portion is large enough that you can get a good grip but the clippers themselves are a bit smaller for easy trimming of baby and toddler nails. They are durable; multiple droppings never did any harm. This is my go-to nail clipper for infants and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Best ones and great price
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST. I’ve been a nervous wreck trying to trim little finger/toenails and these make it way easier. They are sharp enough to get the job done but I’ve never accidentally cut too deep or anything. Very easy to hold and so great for the price. The first set broke, the little pin connecting the base to the handle slipped out. But they did last quite a while and they’re so affordable it wasn’t a big deal to buy again after >1 year of use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TrumpetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy them
customer_reviews.text: I, like many other parents out there have experienced the horror of cutting my baby’s skin accidentally, when attempting to clip his tiny, almost microscopic fingernails. I cannot say these nail clippers will ensure you will never accidentally clip your baby’s skin, but I can say these are the easiest to use, so it will decrease the chances. So go ahead buy them and just clip nice and slow, you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest nail clippers for baby
customer_reviews.text: I had these little clippers come in a set by the same company and we loved them. They made it so much easier to clip tiny baby nails and wiggly toddler nails. The size made them easy to keep up with and easier to hold on to. They broke around my daughter’s third birthday and I ordered this pair to replace the old ones and I love them just as much. I have tried files, trimmers, and other baby nail clippers but I like these the best.
customer_reviews.author: MorganTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love these...second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this when my son was born over 4 years ago. Used them with his baby sister as well and then was going strong for the 3rd addition to the family until they finally broke. I'd say that's pretty darn good considering I was using it frequently for 2 kids for years and even a bit with baby #3. I didn't hesitate to buy the same brand again. Very easy to hold and get a good accurate cut, even for small babies. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BlissfullyySweetTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Quality has significantly declined
customer_reviews.text: I had a green version that lasted me over 3 years of regular use with my son. It finally broke while cutting his toenails. I ordered a new one but the quality has drastically declined. I thought I recieved a chinese knockoff because even logo started coming off after just a month. I asked for a replacement but this one doesn't seem any better. This used to be a fantastic product but the new version seems much more flimsy with more plastic vs the rubber that it used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Dull and not as good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same brand 10 years ago, and the one I have still as sharp as it can be. I went online searches of the same clipper and found this one hoping it would be as good as my old one. But it’s dull, not as good as and I wasn’t satisfied at all. Definitely less quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: The only clippers my toddler will let me use
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers are great. They are ergonomically designed so your hand/fingers sits nicely in them while attempting to trim little toddler fingers that are running away from you. These are the only ones Ive found that my 2 year old doesn’t totally freak out about. I can trim his nails in about 30 seconds and that’s about all the time he’ll give me anyway. If (and by if I mean when) we lose these, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clippers
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are gentle enough to use on our 6 month old than any other pair we’ve tried. This is our second pair, our first pair broke after 3 years of use. We should have probably just got a new pair anyways since I feel they well out-lived their life expectancy anyways at 3 years. Buy these clippers, for the price you get a great pair that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bpuc

customer_reviews.title: These nail clippers are awesome for small babies
customer_reviews.text: These nail clippers are awesome for small babies. I’ve tried a few brands and these are by far my absolute fave. They are easy to grip, I almost never nic his little fingers because these clippers are just so easy to use. I’ve ordered a few sets of them just to have around the house. I even prefer these for my nails over my own nail clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.

customer_reviews.title: Get the other ones with the LED lights!
customer_reviews.text: So... The same company makes a better pair of these. They have little LED lights, which (I know) sounds ridiculous, until you try it; then you discover it's genius! The LED pair also catches the trimmings. Spend a few extra bucks. The light is super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Vlach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one like this for over 5 years but it finally gave out. Idk how it broke but it did and I was devastated. This is the only nail clipper I can use on my little babies. (5yr old and 18 month old) I’m so glad I was able to find the exact same one (this time in green)! I hope it lasts me 5 years or more it’s such a good little nail clipper!
customer_reviews.author: GirlNotInMexico

customer_reviews.title: Best Infant Clippers Out There
customer_reviews.text: Best infant nail clippers I've found so far. Easier to hold then those little white ones I see everywhere. Has a good grippy material and the lever that helps a ton. The size helps you have better control. Just a PSA for first time parents, easiest to clip your baby's nails when they are asleep. Not enough people tell new parents this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: No fear nail trimmers
customer_reviews.text: I've been terrified of cutting my child's nails since he was born (I make my husband do it). I just have always been worried about cutting him on accident. I needed clippers on the fly one day because his nails were tearing me up, so I borrowed a pair from a friend. Not only was I able to successfully trim his nails, I was able to do it quickly and without fuss. So I immediately ordered these and have been happy with them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I've used a few styles and this one is easy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several different styles of nail clippers for my infant and I have to say that this one seems to be the easiest to use by far! the oversized grip makes it easy to hold onto - even if the baby is squirming - and the tiny cutting blade is perfect for getting the job done without taking any "skin" in the process... Definitely Dad approved.
customer_reviews.author: ZachMac

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to hold!
customer_reviews.text: This nail clipper is extremely comfortable to hold. Occasionally, my fingers will slip when I cut my nails with my normal nail clipper, but I haven't had this issue with this one. I can't comment on the durability, since I've only had it for about a week. However, it seems to be well made. I know the description says that it is for babies, but it works just fine for adults. If anyone has trouble gripping nail clippers, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Provides awesome grip and stability - hubby can trim little’s nails!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST pair of clippers for baby. My husband can use them on our toddlers with his big hands, unlike the normal,tiny clippers. These provide so much more stability and grip, which in turn, gives me 100 percent more confidence when trimming tiny human nails. This is our second pair for home - I’ve given multiple clippers to new mommas as shower gifts also - they rave about them being one of the most useful gifts they’ve received!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little clippers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for my daughter's nails for about 3 years. They broke somehow and we ordered another one of these to replace it. We had great use out of the other ones and hope these last a bit longer. She may have just broken them and not told us, but they feel nice and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands in the past 3.5 years with my toddlers, but this is by far my favorite. I love the simplicity of the clipper, that there isn't a bulky edge of plastic on the sides (as with the NailFrida)... I feel ensures a cleaner cut, and not risking missing the edges. My first pair finally broke after over 3 years of weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: These make clipping my newborns nail less stressful. I have 3 children and I wish I had these clippers with the other two. I would have such anxiety when I had to clip their nails. I was always afraid i might accidentally clip a finger and the clippers would always slide in my hand. With these I don't have to worry. They provide a great grip and make me feel much more confident in clipping his nails which you want we doing this for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: jaiditti

customer_reviews.title: Easier to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I was at first using their simpler bulb handle nail clippers that came with a safety first kit I received as a gift. I saw these and read the reviews about how much more comfortable and easier these are to use and I have to agree! I can't go back. The handle makes this product. I've had no issues with dullness or accidently cutting skin. I don't know how every person uses these but after I used them for the first time I don't see how I could even clip skin. Even with my son initially squiriming like a mad man to get free. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Duran

customer_reviews.title: Just have to be a little more careful but that cuts versus just puts in indentation or tears at the nails like this piece of junk does
customer_reviews.text: The rubber piece on the part you press down only has the metal going through 2/3 of it, so after some use, the metal starts breaking through the rubber which is kind of thin in that area. It's cuts nails below average. I just use my adult clippers (Parada Brand) in the small size. Just have to be a little more careful but that cuts versus just puts in indentation or tears at the nails like this piece of junk does.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Used this over and over, no other infant clippers have faired as well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these over the years due to losing them. I've tried other infant friendly nail clippers, none of them seemed as safe as these, not did any of them cut as well. They seem to have two stage cutting mechanism where you squeeze the clippers the clamp down on the nail and then further squeeze to cut the nail. This seems like a great safety feature to prevent cutting fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Cut my kids finger not his nail
customer_reviews.text: Not safe. :( while clipping my sons nails, I nicked the front of his finger and got him instead. Sure their small and you would feel comfortable maneuvering them around an infants small fingers, but they are still nail clippers and sharp and just like an adult, you can cut a child too. I’m sure you can guess what I did! Just use a nail file on your kids nails. Much safer!!!!!!! Lesson sadly learned :(
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nicks!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and small size which seem perfect for cutting a baby’s nails- However it’s very difficult to use without nicking baby’s fingers! Both times I tried it I nicked baby’s skin and then I stopped cutting them until I came across a baby nail scissor product that cuts rather than clips and it was easier to use and did not cause any nicks!
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several different kinds of baby nail clippers since our LO was born a few weeks ago and these are amazing. Allows you to get a great trim in without snipping the skin (so long as you're patient and do it when baby is sleeping at least) and cuts a clean cut with no snags. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tug fam

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are the only nail clippers I'll use on our son, since he was a newborn to now at 18 months. Comfortable to grip, don't have to apply much pressure, and cut very easily/smoothly. I was given another pair when he was first born, tried them once (and felt like I was going to cut his skin/didn't have control with them), and have used these ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia58

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I feel much more comfortable using this to cut my baby's nails than anything else I have tried using before. It's a nerve-wracking thing for me to do to begin with, but this product has made me feel much less anxiety and more in control. Ended up buying another one too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clippers.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I was terrified to clip my son’s nails for the first time. I had heard so many stories of babies bleeding and screaming etc. But these clippers are easy to use and the easy grip handle makes clipping my son’s nails so much better. It’s hard enough trying to hold his little fingers, so having the larger handle on the clippers is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Unruh

customer_reviews.title: The best to hold and very gentle clipper
customer_reviews.text: The best to hold and very gentle clipper. Works very smooth, no pressing or any effort. The blade is narrow = perfect for kids size nails. Adult clippers are too wide to operate on children's nails. I had one that lasted 2.5 years, now I am ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana Ciganikova

customer_reviews.title: usually good
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before so I ordered them again and this time I must have received a defective one the blade that cuts the nail has a gash in it and it pulls my nail verses cuts it. Kinda bummed bc my last pair lasted for 10 years and were always the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: never knew how good it was untile i lost it
customer_reviews.text: i took my baby to thailand and i lost this nail clipper in the hotel there. i had to get a new nail clipper for my baby from their local store. i truly appreciated this one after i purchased a different one. this one is just sharp enough for the baby nails, but you don't want it to be too sharp because it might cut baby skin.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Avi

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, until about 6 months of normal use on two kids when the clippers got too dull to cut my 3 year olds soft little nails anymore. It's become useless unfortunately, will need to buy a new one of a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for new parents
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared to cut my little one's nail but they were getting long and she would scratch me everytime she breastfed. So I absolutely had to clip the talons! These are easy to use and help keep you steady when your shaking from fear. I would recommend cutting the baby's nails when they are asleep since it's easier to grip their hand with less fear.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Oh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip, work well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have owned. The first pair fell apart after 2 kids. The pin that holds the top part to the bottom part completely fell out, which is why I deducted a star. BUT, even though that happened, I bought another pair because of the various clippers we’ve tried, these work the best. And they’re easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Es El Si Boy

customer_reviews.title: Awful clippers, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to hold and use but they do not cut nails well at all. They end up making it even harder to trim baby’s nails because 75% of the time when you clip, the nail is not cut. In my opinion, this was money down the drain. We can’t use them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for safely cutting babies nails!
customer_reviews.text: For all parents out there worrying about having to cut their baby’s nails for the first time out of fear you might nip then a bit, fear no longer! This nail clipper truly makes it super easy and a very safe method for cutting little ones nails. After accidentally making my little one bleed after cutting his nails for the first time I was so traumatized and vowed never to cut his nails again, but reluctantly decided to try again with a nail clipper especially made for babies and The Safety 1st truly made all the difference. I’m extremely happy that I never have to worry again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best baby nail clippers!
customer_reviews.text: Only clippers that seem to work for me on my little guy! They were a baby shower gift but came as part of a $20 set so when I broke them I was a bit stressed...so glad I could find them here on Amazon sold individually! I used my first ones for 1.5 years and have been using these new ones for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER P.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey!
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised with the number of positive reviews. The quality is not that good. A bit pricey for the kind of material used. The only thing I liked about it is that its easy to hold; it will give you a nice grip. But I find it very sharp for a baby clipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best for new born nail clipping.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought for my second new kid, after the first one broke after 4 rigorous use with my first kid. So easy to control for those tiny nails. I dont feel confident with any other nail clippers. I preffer this then filing even for my 1 mo old.
customer_reviews.author: Vish

customer_reviews.title: Five years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best nail clippers! My other pair broke after almost 5 years of use, I tried a different brand that was available in store and was severely disappointed. So happy to see these are still being produced!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget L.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids. This came in a kit and they're the best most comfortable clippers around. I had to have another one. They are comfortable in your hand and sharp enough to be precise and not rip nails. These are the perfect gift for a new mom or a veteran mom and will be a staple in my home for as long as I'm trimming tiny nails.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary H.

customer_reviews.title: I was terrified until I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely terrified to trim my new baby's finger nails until I purchased these. They are so easy to use. The handle gives you great control. Definitely a must-have for all new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp
customer_reviews.text: These don't cut. The ones I got anyway weren't very sharp at all. It ALMOST cuts entirely through but it doesn't really then you end up having to pull it off, like a perforated sheet of paper, rather than just clipping it off.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly easy to use! I love the rubberized grip, which keeps the clippers from slipping out of my hands when I'm using them on my six-month-old. The resulting cut is smooth and clean with no jagged edges. No filing required afterwards! I also like how the curved tips collect the cut nail so they don't go flying all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for both parent & kid.
customer_reviews.text: Have used the same pair through 2 kids before they broke. Bought a new one because they are awesome for those little nails. They are a bit weak to cut older nails (they don't work on my 8 year olds big toe now). They are very comfortable and secure to hold onto when cutting little ones nails. And I love the size because u can find them in the drawer which might have been an issue if they were kept small & harder to see. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M. Tembreull

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small
customer_reviews.text: These infant clippers are nice to work with. They fit nicely in your hand, and are a nice small size to cut infant nails. Regular clippers will not work (too clumsy). One still has to be careful, its just too easy to cut the babies skin, but that is mainly because they move their hands so irratically (especially when they are newborns). Still, we've used these since he was a week and keeping his nails reasonably short. We tried using files, but it took so long just to do one nail, we just couldn't keep that up (as anyone knows, you have very little spare energy with a newborn). Using these, we got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Red Cat

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had it earlier, cutting fingernail used to be a nightmare. Thanks to Safety 1st Steady Grip Infant Nail Clipper, I can finally cut my son's finger nail without him crying for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mia S

customer_reviews.title: especially since they are very dull and can hardly even cut my baby's nails
customer_reviews.text: As a new parent, I was as nervous as anyone else to clip my little one's nails for the first time. These clippers didn't make me nervous at all, especially since they are very dull and can hardly even cut my baby's nails. I will be looking for a different set.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get dull and keeps clipping safely!
customer_reviews.text: These clip well, and are well sized for holding. I like that they seem to last a while, and don't dull down like another pair I have. I have not had any problems with these falling apart - an I like the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I had been using them for year, but with kids in the house my first two pairs were inevitably lost, happy to have them replaced. Easy to hold and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love these clippers
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, the size of it is perfect to hold, does not slip off your hands and clippers are just perfect size for tiny nails. I had one that Came with a set and I used that for 3 years and its still like new, this is my second one for my second baby love the product
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Good to handle
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use although frightening trying to clip a little ones nails. I wish the clippers didnt open as much so I could just get the nail thickness. Several times I nearly nicked the baby's skin because of how far they open.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had one before with my first baby and decided to buy it with my second baby, however this was not made the same. I don't even know if it's the actual brand because the logo came off. It wasn't sharp enough either. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EMON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clippers for toddlers little nails
customer_reviews.text: These are great nail clippers for my toddler. I got the lighted set, same brand, when she was born but had to find something different when she outgrew them. These fit the bill. They are very comfortable to hold and use, and the non slip gripper and shape makes it easier to use even when she's squirmy. They are very sharp and made me a little nervous at first, but now I really appreciate that I know they will cut cleanly through the nail every time.
customer_reviews.author: A's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My last cheap brand was way better
customer_reviews.text: Takes me 2x longer to cut my sons nails with these.. it’ll look like the nail is in the right place then when I clip- nothing, the nail wasn’t in! Being that my child hates getting groomed, it’s infuriating to mess with faulty clippers!
customer_reviews.author: Kinsers

customer_reviews.title: I love these clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I have hand arthritis and I cannot usually cut my own fingernails, but these are so easy to grip and use that I can actually do my own fingers! These are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: H. Berty

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these clippers on pink that came in as part of a pack. Those are great, but after 2 years they fell apart. So, I bought these as they are the exact same ones, but in green. However, I feel like these are cheaply made and not very sturdy. Both my husband and I even happened to clip our baby's skin with it. This had never happened to us before with our older child with the pink clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Svecova

customer_reviews.title: Best baby nail clippers!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other nail clippers for my kids and keep coming back to this one. I also bought the Safety 1st one that comes with a light - and it was not near as good. In fact, the one with the light made it impossible to see their actual fingers! This is compact and easy to use. Trims their nails so quickly and well. My last one lasted for about 5 years before I had to buy a new one and replace it. A great product that will last you for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for me a couple times, but then the two pieces kept coming apart. I’d put them back together, and after a couple nails, they would slip apart again. Not sure if I was doing something wrong or not, but I’ve used lots of nail clippers, and never had issues like I had with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great nail clipper.
customer_reviews.text: My go to nail clipper for my toddler. I’ve never once clipped her with these. They are sturdy (my husband has even used them and they withheld). I lost one pair and bought another because I like this one some much.
customer_reviews.author: Lizby

customer_reviews.title: My favorite clippers for baby/toddler
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nail clippers so far! This is the third pair I have had since my baby, now almost two year old was born. Easy to use, comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nail clipper I will use on my son. We tried out a few different ones that came in kits that were gifted to us, and the Safety 1st was the best one and easy to use. We have been using this one since he was born and he's now 3.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great clipper for mini hands and toes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second pair of these clippers because I need to clip our son's nails while he's sleeping and it doesn't do me any good when they're in his toiletries bag in the bathroom and he's asleep on his nursing pillow. The ones that came with the Safety 1st kit work great - they feel great in my hand and make clean cuts! Unfortunately these ones aren't as sharp as they should be. Considering how cheap they are, it didn't make sense to return them for an exchange as that would have been a colossal waste of manpower and energy! They do what I need them to do so I'm pleased enough to continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Conlon

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item because I had the same pair in blue that were my favorite and wanted another pair
customer_reviews.text: These clippers did not work. That being said, I purchased this item because I had the same pair in blue that were my favorite and wanted another pair. I guess consistence of product is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Maxmax

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had had them from beginning
customer_reviews.text: After using the standard white Safety 1st nail clippers for 2 years, I discovered these. My daughter and I both appreciate how much faster (and steadier) her nails can be trimmed using these.
customer_reviews.author: Travelgal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Safety first clippers seam to cut better than any other brand I've used. That said, the design of these did not make it any easier to grip/use than their cheaper design. They were actually kind of awkward for awhile and they make my daughter freak out. If I knew then what I know now, I would have got the cheaper safety first clippers.
customer_reviews.author: smiley

customer_reviews.title: Does this job and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves to wave his arms around, and kept scratching his face on accident. I picked these up when he was about a month old, and they work pretty good. They're easy to use, but you have to be extra careful not to cut too much of the nail! Overall I recommend, the price is great and they get the job done. Just wish his nails didn't grow so quick!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace the one I had previously. It worked really well but after a couple of months regular use they are beginning to get dull.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Only clippers I like
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a handful of other baby clippers, and these are the only ones I like. They are easy to hold, which is super important with a squirmy baby! This is the second set I've purchased just to have another one at the house for those times I misplace the others.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with these nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers I received did not work. They did not cut my toddler's nails and her nails are not thick. Maybe the clippers are too dull. I didn't bother contacting the seller for a return since the item was only $3.49.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backup
customer_reviews.text: This clipper is kept in our diaper bag and works well. Wish I had purchased the one the magnifier attached as her nails are just so tiny right now!
customer_reviews.author: mgrod

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Trimming a baby's nails is the hardest part of parenthood but these clippers make it easier. I tried those expensive nail buffers and nothing did the trick like small clippers. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: PrinKuBas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it, cutting tiny thin baby nails are a pain no matter what! These worked perfectly for us, easy to hold and gets the job done well. I always use them when baby is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers you'll have to keep buying.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/hate relationship with these clippers. They are great to hold, they clip really well and they are overall pretty awesome. But.. I've bought 4 of them now. The little metal rod holding the top of the clipper to the bottom slips out. And I have tried multiple tools to get it to go back in. No dice. So I end up buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steane

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cut well. I nipped my baby a little on the second use. I am not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of these, I got as a gift and I loved them!!! Super easy to use and cut my baby's nails with very clean smooth edges. My dog chewed these up, so I ordered another pair on Amazon. The second pair sucks! They seem much duller than the other ones and they leave sharp and peeling edges on my baby's nails. I would like to think it's a defective pair, but don't want to take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C

customer_reviews.title: The best clipper for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the best clipper for babies, I used it with my first son, gave one to my sister and one to my brother and they all agreed that it is so easy to use. I ordered again for my second baby. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victogenia

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I would like this nail clipper as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I would like this nail clipper as much as I do. It had good reviews and was inexpensive but it just didn't seem like it would fit well in my hand. The shape really helps to keep your grip while you're nervously trying not to injure your child as you cut their nails. Safe and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Don't spend lots of money on a fancy name or brand - these work perfect. We have had them for a long time and my son is now 2 - we continue to use them. I was always nervous clipping my sons nails, but I feel like I have good control with these.
customer_reviews.author: thebee1517

customer_reviews.title: Not very sharp
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don’t have a light on them, and there is no side guard that makes it difficult to cut their toenails. It’s not very sharp, though, so sometimes the nails tear instead of cut.
customer_reviews.author: MomToTwo

customer_reviews.title: Total crap
customer_reviews.text: Had to wait a long time for them to arrive, and when they finally did, they were horrible quality: wouldn't make a clean cut across the cutting surface. Tried to contact the seller but because I threw away the packaging (who would expect there to be a problem with fricking nail clippers?!) and don't have the technology to comply with their return policy demands, I just threw the dang thing away.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design. The one I got may be defective but it doesn’t clip nails because the blades don’t line up. Which is sad because it really is a nice shape for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: I dont really see what’s “safety” about these nail clippers other than the fact that the handles have enormous ergonomic grips. The blades are baby-sized, and these clippers seem perfectly good at doing what they’re supposed to-clipping baby’s nails.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Best nail clippers for Kids on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for little fingers. Outside material provides great grip and stability when clipping tiny nails. The ONLY go to nail clippers to replace every lost pair for my kids lol. Other clippers either slip out of fingers while trying to be precise.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids aren’t babies anymore but these are my favorite for clipping little pieces of skin or hang nails. They’re so sharp. They also don’t split nails. They cut so cleanly
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these since 2010 & it was hands down the best baby (& small child) nail clipper ever. We lost it somewhere in the house, which is the only reason I had to replace it! Top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Makes cutting nails so easy
customer_reviews.text: This makes the nail clipping so easy. You don’t have to press super hard. Initially I used to cut baby’s nails while he was asleep. Now I can easily do it even while he is Awake with this clipper. It has never hurt him.
customer_reviews.author: nayana

customer_reviews.title: One of those baby gimmick items, you could go ...
customer_reviews.text: One of those baby gimmick items, you could go out and buy a simple small set of clippers and save some cash, these just add a bit of stability to the job, and don't work well with little fingers (at least from my experience)
customer_reviews.author: FashionableMilkMan

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I have about 4 pairs of these throughout my house. We all use these when cutting our nails. Love how easy they are to hold!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E

product_meta.title: Safety 1st Steady Grip Infant Nail Clipper (Colors May Vary)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Make grooming your baby's nails safer with the specially-designed Safety 1st Steady Grip Infant Clipper. The extra-large handle allows you to hold and operate the clippers more securely, trimming fingernails and toenails more effectively and safely, while the soft-touch texture steadies your grip. Folding up for storage, this nail clipper makes a great addition to your diaper bag. This pack includes one infant nail clipper.
feature_bullets: Designed for baby's nails: Nail clipper is specially designed for trimming tiny finger and toe nails
Easy to hold & use extra large, soft touch handle provides a more comfortable and secure grip
Safe for all ages nail clippers can be used from newborns to toddlers
Perfect for diaper bag folding up for storage, this nail clipper makes a great addition to your diaper bag
1 piece set this pack includes one infant nail clipper

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
